com.facebook.react

类 ReactDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.react.ReactDelegate

  • public class ReactDelegate
extends java.lang.Object
    A delegate for handling React Application support. This delegate is unaware whether it is used in an Activity or a Fragment.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ReactDelegate(android.app.Activity activity, ReactNativeHost reactNativeHost, java.lang.String appKey, android.os.Bundle launchOptions)

      boolean shouldShowDevMenuOrReload(int keyCode, android.view.KeyEvent event)
      Handles delegating the Activity.onKeyUp(int, KeyEvent) method to determine whether the application should show the developer menu or should reload the React Application.

      • shouldShowDevMenuOrReload

        public boolean shouldShowDevMenuOrReload(int keyCode,
                                         android.view.KeyEvent event)
        Handles delegating the Activity.onKeyUp(int, KeyEvent) method to determine whether the application should show the developer menu or should reload the React Application.
        返回:
        true if we consume the event and either shoed the develop menu or reloaded the application.
